Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics

Class Texture

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.Texture
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics.Texture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Const, Asset, ConstTexture
public class Texture extends org.jsfml.graphics.Texture implements ConstTexture, Asset
Represents a 2D texture stored on the graphics card for rendering. The source must be the path to an image file or an InputStream to image data. Supported formats are: BMP, DDS, PNG, TGA and PSD. If the specified image data source is not valid (for instance, if the data is corrupt, or the specified file does not exist), the texture is replaced with a magenta-black checkboard.

    • bind

      public static void bind(@Nullable @Nullable ConstTexture texture, @NotNull @NotNull Texture.CoordinateType coordinateType)
      Activates a texture for rendering with the specified coordinate type. This is required only if you wish to use Kyanite textures in custom OpenGL code.
      Parameters:
      texture - the texture to bind, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used
      coordinateType - the coordinate type to use
